program_description: Community Development Block Grant - Disaster Recovery Program. HUD provides flexible grants to help cities, counties, and States recover from Presidentially declared disasters, especially in low-income areas, subject to availability of supplemental appropriations.
project_name: DCA Federal Highway Administration for DOT UN
project_description: Using Community Development Block Grant Disaster Recovery (CDBG-DR) funds, the Non-Federal Cost Share Match program gives the New Jersey Department of Transportation (NJDOT) funding to cover the non-federal match portion of post-storm transportation and infrastructure repair and resiliency, e.g., the repair of Route 35, funded under the Federal Highway Administration Program.
